name: Github with Operator Mono
description: Use Operator Mono font for code on Github.
additional_info: If you own the Operator Mono font by Hoefler & Co. and frequently use Github, this style is for you. All code (even in the editors) on Github will be displayed in the Operator Mono font. Comments and string literals are italicized to take advantage of the beautiful cursive ligatures. Important: The Operator Mono font must be installed on your computer in order for this style to work.
